content:
✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Great idea to take existing game as inspiration! Looks fun :)

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Very fun and unique clash

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Fun clash with slightly tricky middle-finding logic :)

Side note:
I have found a great first guess to be "MORON", since all 5 letters are close to the middle of the alphabet (13, 15, 18, 15, 14).

It would be interesting to extend this clash with the full list of accepted words (e.g., https://github.com/vegeta897/word-peaks/blob/main/src/lib/words/targets-filtered.json) to find the best guess that would truly "halve" the search space :)

For my reference, code golf attempt in Python:

i=input
s=""
for a,b in zip(map(ord,i()),i()):s+=chr(([92,65,a][ord(b)-65]+a)//2)
i(s)

Yeah, I'd love to look at that problem, but it wouldn't work for a clash, and maybe not even a puzzle, since the word list would be huge.

But yeah, aiming for the 'middle letter' is certainly not always optimal, especially when VWXYZ are all so uncommon.

I was thinking of including a link in the puzzle that points externally to the full list of words, and just having the player import and parse the full list however they want.

Might try this with a small subset of words (or even just use a set of all possible 3-letter combinations) for a start, will see.

I just solved the best first guess using this approach and it took me the better half of a day.

Final Top Ten Guesses (sorted by entropy descending):
Guess: 'plink', Entropy: 6.2174
Guess: 'moile', Entropy: 6.2099
Guess: 'slink', Entropy: 6.1739
Guess: 'point', Entropy: 6.1494
Guess: 'plonk', Entropy: 6.1485
Guess: 'plier', Entropy: 6.1274
Guess: 'linin', Entropy: 6.1198
Guess: 'goier', Entropy: 6.1150
Guess: 'ronin', Entropy: 6.0973
Guess: 'looie', Entropy: 6.0900

Calculated the entropy (in bits) based on the answer list, and used all words in the dictionary list.

I tried a simpler calculation too, where the guess entropy was just the sum of the entropies of each individual one of its letters against the answer list in that letter position. That gave the same final answer: plink, but others in a different order.

Final Top Ten Guesses (sorted by entropy descending):
Guess: 'plink', Entropy: 6.4091
Guess: 'plier', Entropy: 6.3872
Guess: 'moile', Entropy: 6.3714
Guess: 'slink', Entropy: 6.3661
Guess: 'goier', Entropy: 6.3605
Guess: 'plonk', Entropy: 6.3557
Guess: 'slier', Entropy: 6.3441
Guess: 'flier', Entropy: 6.3326
Guess: 'point', Entropy: 6.3196
Guess: 'moner', Entropy: 6.3068
